testcase.classname: Acceptance Testing to validate the Search Car page is working fine.
testcase.name: Validate the Serach car page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on homepage "https://www.carsguide.com.au/" of carsguide portal..passed When I move to the menu.....................................................passed And Click on "Search Cars" link.............................................passed And Select carbrand as "BMW" from AnyMake dropdown..........................passed And Select model as " 118D" from models dropdown...........................passed And Select location as "NSW - Hunter" from locations dropdown...............passed And Select price as "$45,000" from prices dropdown..........................passed And Click on "Find my next car" button......................................passed Then I should see the searched cars list....................................passed And The page title should be "Bmw 118d Under 45000 for Sale Hunter NSW | carsguide".passed
